Indian Economy.title: Global outlook: The world economy seems stable but that doesn’t mean the storm has passed
Indian Economy.summary: Global growth has weathered this year’s uncertainty and geopolitical shocks so far, but hidden structural weaknesses could worsen as economies slow down. Policymakers must push for resilience-focused reforms in case the worst is yet to come.
